attributes.action: Introduce fully funded bus and train fares for all under 18's.
attributes.additional_details: Currently Tallinn in Estonia have a fully funded system and other countries such as China, Singapore and Belgium have trialled this in areas of their country.  We want young people to have the ability to attend schools and colleges they wish without being restricted by transport links or costs.
attributes.background: We feel that a fully subsidised transport system for under 18's in education is important and help out young people in this country.  This is to help young people who are unable to afford travel cost.
